name: Smart-Speed
description:
Smart-Speed is a car game  combines Car Driving and Adventure

The Game Made By the Tunisian "Hamed Kalifa" on Unity Engine 

Smart-Speed released On 16 March 2020 it takes only 3 months and 16 day to develop

Learn More at : kh7tunisiandeveloper.cf

System Requirements

OS: Windows®7 or later.

Memory: 1 GB RAM.

Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more.

Controlling:

Movement:

W/S/A/D or ARROWS.

Handbrake:

Space.
